title: Cat. 85.1  Woman Picking Fruit and Oviri, 1895/96
publication_title: Gauguin Paintings, Sculpture, and Graphic Works at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">Woman Picking Fruit and Oviri  
1895/96  
Wood-block print in black ink on thin ivory Japanese paper laid down on thin ivory Japanese paper (a modern mount); 105 × 90 mm (image); 153 × 112 mm (sheet)  
The Art of the Institute, gift of Edward McCormick Blair, 2002.254  
Guérin 49, Kornfeld 36  
For the verso, see fig. 85.1.1

</section><section class="osci-tk-epub-section provenance" id="provenance">Gustave Fayet (1865–1925), Béziers, France.

By descent, to his wife, Madeleine d’Andoque (1873–1971), Béziers, France.

Sold to Alice Adam Ltd., Chicago, for Edward McCormick Blair (1915–2010), Chicago, Oct. 1983.

Given by Edward McCormick Blair to the Art Institute of Chicago, 2002.

</section><section class="osci-tk-epub-section exhibitions" id="exhibitions">Art Institute of Chicago, Intimate Encounters: Paul Gauguin and the South Pacific; The Edward McCormick Blair Collection, Sept. 6, 2003–Jan. 11, 2004, cat. 26.

</section><section class="osci-tk-epub-section references" id="references">Marcel Guérin, L’oeuvre gravé de Gauguin (H. Floury, 1927; Alan Wofsy Fine Arts, 1980), cat. 49.

Elizabeth Mongan, Eberhard W. Kornfeld, and Harold Joachim, Paul Gauguin: Catalogue Raisonné of His Prints, with assistance of Christine H. Stauffer (Galerie Kornfeld, 1988), p. 156, cat. 36.

Art Institute of Chicago, Intimate Encounters: Paul Gauguin and the South Pacific; The Edward McCormick Blair Collection, exhibition brochure (Art Institute of Chicago, 2003), cat. 26.

</section><section epub:type="footnotes" id="footnotes">Elizabeth Mongan, Eberhard W. Kornfeld, and Harold Joachim, Paul Gauguin: Catalogue Raisonné of His Prints, with assistance of Christine H. Stauffer (Galerie Kornfeld, 1988), p. 156, cat. 36.

Elizabeth Mongan, Eberhard W. Kornfeld, and Harold Joachim, Paul Gauguin: Catalogue Raisonné of His Prints, with assistance of Christine H. Stauffer (Galerie Kornfeld, 1988), p. 156, cat. 36.

Alice Adam Ltd., Chicago, invoice addressed to Edward Blair, Sr., Oct. 13, 1983, curatorial object file, Department of Prints and Drawings, Art Institute of Chicago.

</section><section id="figures">Cat. 85.1 Woman Picking Fruit and Oviri, 1895/96.

fig. 85.1.1 Verso of Gauguin’s Woman Picking Fruit and Oviri, 1895/96. The Art Institute of Chicago, 2002.254.

</section>
